summary: The course 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate' is a hybrid program offered by אוניברסיטת בר-אילן (Bar-Ilan University) through its בית הספר להייטק וסייבר (School of High-Tech and Cyber). The course covers a comprehensive curriculum designed to prepare participants for AWS certification in cloud architecture. Topics include introducing cloud architecting, adding storage, compute, and database layers, creating and connecting networking environments, securing user and application access, implementing elasticity, high availability, and monitoring, automating architecture, caching content, building decoupled architectures, microservices, and serverless architectures, planning for disaster recovery, and bridging to certification. The course requires prior AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge. It spans 20 sessions over 100 academic hours, with classes held on Tuesdays (17:30-21:30) and Fridays (09:00-13:00). The program begins on 01.11.2024 and offers flexibility for participants to attend either on-campus at בר-אילן or via Zoom.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to prepare participants for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate certification. It provides comprehensive training on cloud architecture, focusing on AWS services and best practices. Participants will gain hands-on experience in designing, deploying, and managing scalable and secure applications on the AWS platform.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have completed AWS Practitioner training or possess equivalent knowledge.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 01.11.2024.
- Duration: 20 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 100 hours.
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participants' preference.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Welcome to AWS Academy Cloud Architecting.
- Introducing Cloud Architecting.
- Adding a Storage Layer.
- Adding a Compute Layer.
- Adding a Database Layer.
- Creating a Networking Environment.
- Connecting Networks.
- Securing User and Application Access.
- Implementing Elasticity, High Availability, and Monitoring.
- Automating Your Architecture.
- Caching Content.
- Building Decoupled Architectures.
- Building Microservices and Serverless Architectures.
- Planning for Disaster.
- Bridging to Certification.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an admission interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
- The program is part of Bar-Ilan University's dedicated training programs.

CERTIFICATIONS: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate.
